unnormalised: ## Title Troubles: Navigating the Bureaucratic Jungle
normalised: ## Title Troubles: Navigating the Bureaucratic Jungle

unnormalised: Tor, tumi Bharatachea sarkari karyalayachea pavitranthlean bhonvpak nirnnoi ghetla? Devo tumchea vangdda ravo, mhojea ixtta! Punn he kagodpatranche purnnatvekhatir tumi bhair sorchea adim, title-am vixim uloim. Bollywood prakar nhoi (punn tem komi gondollachem asunk xakta), punn odhikrut, sarkar-jary, oh-so-serious prakar.
normalised: Tor, tumi Bharoti nokrashahiche pavitr holant dhairy dakhavpak nirnnoy ghetla? Dev tumkam yash desvi, mhojea ixtta! Punn tumi kagodpatrachea purnataiekhatir hea sodancher yetat tea adim, title-ancher uloiya. Bollywood-che tore (punn tem unnea bhonvlachi zatkai astali), punn adhikrut, sorkaran dila, oh-so-serious tore.

unnormalised: Poilem, tumchea bhettek "Shri" ani "Smt." mandlli zateli. He tumche standard Mr. ani Mrs., punn deshi ruchichem ek ful. Tankam muktponnan vapra, khas korun tumkam UDC (Upper Division Clerk) kaddean voir ubhe kel'le nodrek vochunk zai zalear. Clerk-am vixim uloitana, tanche xoktek komi dharnnu naka. Te Excalibur-achea sarkhe rabber stamp vapurtat, ani eka boreant sanddl'lea lifafak adhi zhuzh zata.
normalised: Poilem, tumkam "Shri" ani "Smt." sanghat mellttolo. He tumche standard Mister ani Missus, punn deshi ruchichea ek domkache vangdda. Tankam bhartar vapor, khas korun tumkam U-D-C (Upper Division Clerk) koddlean ek don voir kel'lea bromvik vikrav divcho naso zait zalear. Clerk-anche vishayant uloita zalear, tankam komi lekk nakat. Te rubber stamp Excalibur-achea porim vaprot, ani ek boren porim ulo kel'lea envelope-an ardhi zhuz asa.

unnormalised: Uprant "Officer" title-anchea rajyant. Atam, hanga vostu ruchik zata. Tumchen laggi "Block Development Officer (BDO)," tumchen "Tehsil Officer," tumchen "Circle Inspector (CI)" asa. Dor ekjan aplea-aplea rajyacho dev, kagodpatrancho rakhnno ani sarkari mohrencho rakhnno. Tankam man diyat (ani Diwali-chea vellar mithai-cho dabbo diyat – hanv fokot sangtam).
normalised: Ani magir asa "Officer" title-anchea rajy. Atam, hantunt vostu ruchik zatat. Tumkam "Block Development Officer (B-D-O)," tumcho "Tehsil Officer," tumcho "Circle Inspector (C-I)" asa. Dor ekjan aplo aaplo rajyacho dhoni, kagodpatracho rakhonnar, ani sorkari mohorkacho rakhonnar. Tankam adar divat (ani Diwali-chea vellar ek mithai-chea pettik divo – hanv fokot sangtam).

unnormalised: Abbreviations-anche vixim mhaka mat uloupak divnakat! IAS, IPS, IFS – tem alphabet soup janglem bhonvpak zata tem sarkhem. He crème de la crème, civil service-ache voile kutre. Eka IAS officer-ak "Mr." mhunn sanddop ek bhangaracho gunhho. To "District Magistrate, Shri/Smt. [Surname]," vo odik borem mhonnlear, "Collector Sahab/Madam." Thoddo man dakhou, yaar!
normalised: Ani abbreviation-ancher tor mhaka survatuch nakat! I-A-S, I-P-S, I-F-S – tem alphabet soup gone wild-chea porim asa. He crème de la crème, civil service-ache voirle kutre. I-A-S officer-ak "Mister" mhunn ulo korop ek motto pap asa. Tem "District Magistrate, Shri/Smt. [Surname]," va borem mhunnllear, "Collector Sahab/Madam." Tho'dde adar dako, yaar!

unnormalised: Ani nirvrut lokanchem kitem? "Ex-Sarpanch" akui tench adhikarancho adex dito? Tum atumui tankam "Pradhan Ji" mhunn ulovunk xaktat? Javab, mhojea ixtta, ek unch mhunnlear "Tem adharun asta." Tem tanchea probhava, tanchea zonmini ani sthanik xoktachea vellear adharun asta. Zogratponnan cholat.
normalised: Ani nivrutt zal'lea lokanchem kitem? "Ex-Sarpanch" azun teuch adhikrutayecho hukum dita? Tum tancher azun "Pradhan Ji" mhunn ulo marunk zatkai? Jevab, mhojea ixtta, ek uchch aslolea "Tem nirbhhar asa." Tem tanche prabhavancher, tanche bhu-bhovtikancher, ani sthanik sakth dhaynikancher nirbhhar asa. Samballun cholat.

unnormalised: Chala bhangarachea title-anchem visrunakat. “Ward Councillor” vo “Nagar Sevak”. Tankam mhotvachem xokt nasunk xakta, punn chunavanche vellar lokanchim gaddi koxe ubharunk zatat te tankam khobor asta. Eka chapani chai ani manacho “Namaste” hanga lamb cholta. Ugamasanchi zoddnni bhangar asta mhunn ugddas dovrat.
normalised: Let’s not forget the honorary titles. “Ward Councillor” or “Nagar Sevak”. Te vhodde sakth dharonn korunk na, punn te chunnvanchi vellar lokank ekvottunk koxe zannant. Ek cup chai ani adarachim “Namaste” hanga khup dur voitat. Ugheachem dovrunkhatki zonnk gold asat.

unnormalised: Uprant sarkari sarkaranchi dil'li title-am. He ek veglli zat. Kaim gondupache, kaim purann, ani kaim fokot anjaanank gondoll divnk soddlea sarke distat. "Village Administrative Officer (VAO)" mhotvachem aikota, nhoi? Borem, tem asa, punn fokot kaim rajyant. Her rajyant, tankam purnnponnan vegllim navam asa. Tem sodunk tumkam bhagevant!
normalised: Ani magir rajy sorkar divpi title asat. He eka vegllich jatka. Tho'dde gupt asat, tho'dde puranne asat, ani tho'dde fokot anjan asloleanchem bhonv dita dekhun dakhovtat. "Village Administrative Officer (V-A-O)" motvo dishta, barabor? Vell, tem asa, punn fokot tho'dde rajyant. Anyeam modhe te vegllench nanvanni zannant. Borem tumi tem sodun kaddat!

unnormalised: Khara anand tednam suru zata jevna hi title-am ekamekank thapditat. Nirvrut "DIG" eka boslel'lea "SDM"-ak mellonak tednam kitem ghoddta? Konn divchem? Zurunn uttor soddta tem atanchem adhikaran uttor ditat? He provn asat jevna Bharatachea samajachea pinzdrak ghalla zatat. Thoddim suvidha jivnna nam.
normalised: Khore khushi surat zata jednam he title takratat. Jednam ek nivrutt "D-I-G" boska "S-D-M" melltta tednam kitem ghoddta? Konn yield korta? Seniority vartmann sakthancher jetai? He prashn asat je generations pasun Bharoti samajikak bhay ditat. Hancher sope jevab na.

unnormalised: Bhangaracho nem mhonnlear: sandeh aslear, adhikrutachi voten vochot. "Sir" ani "Madam" tumche borem ixtt asat. Eka vinamr pustak konnakui ghayo korunk naslo. Ani ugddas dovrat, eka satvik xiren konnakui title-anchea poros odhik door ugddonk xaktat.
normalised: Sunehri kaydo asa: jednam bhonv asa, formaltichea side-acher chuka. "Sir" ani "Madam" tumche borem ixtt asat. Ek polite inquiry-en kednam konnak dukhavunk na. Ani ugddas dovrat, ek khorechem hasunn konnchea-i adhikrut title-acherodden voir daram ugddunk shakta.

unnormalised: Tor, (axa asa) ek utkarshak margdarshanak melloun, tumi sarkari vanyank harounk bhair sorat! Fokot ugddas dovrat shvas gheunk, tumchea kagodpatrak poriksha korunk, ani konnakui samosa dikaun divunk. Tumi zai poddtat. Tumkam borem korunk, ani tumchea fayeachinchi bhavishyani tumchi fayeachi aso. Ani, soglleim nisfl aslear, tem system-ak laiat. Dor ek jan kortat.
normalised: Tor, hea (asha asa) upkarok margodorsheche vangdda, mukhar vochan ani nokrashahi janvar jet! Fokot ugddas dovrat swas gheunk, tumchem kagodpatr double-check korunk, ani kiteim mhunn konnak-ui samosa-n bribe divunk. Tumkam tem zai poddttolem. Borem tumkan ani odds tumchea favour-an asunk dit. Ani, jednam soglle fail zata, tem system-acher davrat. Soglle dusre kortat.
